text: @replouiegohmert I wish you well.....yeah not so much. You're devoid of  compassion for sick Americans & 150,000+ who are DEAD. Where's your moral outrage? Now imagine having #coronavirus & NO insurance. Will this make you be a better person? Able to find your moral compass?  #GOPBetrayedAmerica
